name: Pokémen
description:
Pokémen Game

the idea of the game is like Pokémon , but here is different creatures

the goal is to beat all the enemies to win and to be the master of the tournament

Game Guidelines :

  • Moving the Player :   you can move the player by the Mouse on clicking on the point you want the character to go there
  • Camera : by holding  A or D , the camera will rotate around the Character
  • Bottle Mode : to go and fight with the Enemy you want , you only need to colloid with the enemy , then Automatically you will be switched to the Battle Scene
  • interaction Button : by pressing X button when the character is inside one of the Building , this will make you go to the Hospital to heal your Pokémens  

you can face the enemies as much you want until you win against him , when the player win against enemy he cant face him again

you can heal your Pokémens in the hospitals buildings

when the player decide too run from a battle , the enemy will restore his HP and his power completely, but the player will remain as it's not restored

Enjoy the Journey and be the Master of the island tournament
